meanings.definition: Skydives: third person singular present of skydive
meanings.sent1: He skydives for fun on weekends.
meanings.sent2: She skydives regularly to overcome her fear of heights.
meanings.sent3: The cat skydives off the couch when startled by a loud noise.
meanings.sent4: His confidence skydives when faced with a challenging situation.
meanings.sent5: The sun slowly skydives below the horizon, painting the sky in hues of orange and pink.

meanings.sent1: The skydives at the airshow were breathtaking to watch.
meanings.sent2: Many people enjoy watching skydives from the ground.
meanings.sent3: The skydives at the zoo were performed by trained professionals.
meanings.sent4: The skydives in the movie looked so realistic.
meanings.sent5: The skydives in the distance looked like colorful birds soaring through the sky.
